duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct wine & craft spirit tastings primarily in retail establishments and at special events.
Explain and promote the wines being featured, and assist in making sales.
Be outgoing, friendly, and polished in appearance to attract customers.
Work part-time flexible weekend hours for occasional events.
Provide a basic understanding of wine and its influence on the world.
Must have a cell phone, internet access, and reliable transportation such as a car.
